name: yuna-music
description: Yuna Music 🎶 - A cute and professional Discord music bot with Vietnamese & English support, featuring beautiful pink-purple embeds and advanced controls.

scripts.setup: npm install && chmod +x install-deps.sh || echo 'chmod failed - not Linux'
scripts.postinstall: npm run rebuild || echo 'Native rebuild failed, using fallbacks'
scripts.test: node -e "console.log('🎵 Yuna Music - Testing configuration...'); const config = require('./config.js'); console.log('✅ Config loaded successfully'); process.exit(0);"
scripts.check-ffmpeg: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); try { execSync('ffmpeg -version', {stdio: 'pipe'}); console.log('✅ FFmpeg is available'); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ FFmpeg not found:', e.message); }"
scripts.check-opus: node -e "try { require('@discordjs/opus'); console.log('✅ @discordjs/opus available'); } catch(e) { try { require('node-opus'); console.log('✅ node-opus available'); } catch(e2) { try { require('opusscript'); console.log('✅ opusscript available'); } catch(e3) { console.log('❌ No Opus library found'); }}}"
scripts.container-setup: npm run fix-opus && npm run diagnose
scripts.diagnose: npm run test && npm run check-ffmpeg && npm run check-opus

author: Umut Bayraktar (CkhangZz)
